name: Basic Player Character Controller
description:
(Crosshair is bugged as this is a demo showing both third and first person at the same time)

This is a demo of a very basic player controller with first and third person functionality. It is designed mainly around 1st person with the third person being a unique solution to have both without changing the behavior or the controller. The main view can be easily changed in the source code but that isn't available in the demo. The gun aims where the first person camera is aiming and the third person camera aims at where the gun is aiming.

ctrl - crouch

space - jump

shift - wall run
